title: Definitions
context: [ยง78-1.5] Definitions. As used herein, unless the context clearly requires otherwise, the terms &ldquo;appointing authority&rdquo;, &ldquo;chief executive&rdquo;, &ldquo;director&rdquo;, &ldquo;employee&rdquo;, &ldquo;employer&rdquo;, and &ldquo;jurisdiction&rdquo; shall have the same meaning as those terms are defined in section 76-11. [L 2000, c 253, pt of ยง74]
